thread.title: ADAM
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by ADAM

author: ADAM
title: ADAM
text: When there was miscommunication about car hire bookings at work a late evening arrival into Darwin meant a last minute booking had to be arranged. Staff member with Red Spot was very helpful, friendly and took care of the booking, even emailed a tax invoice to claim back at work at my request. Unlimited kilometers as part of the rental agreement is definitely a bonus when working in the territory as well.
